name: Dice Roll (bl4ck)
description:
HELLO THANKS FOR CHECKING OUT MY PAGE!

Move by dragging
Go to menu by pressing escape
Restart by pressing R

KNOWN ISSUES:
Music overlaps when going to menu
Shadows are messed up

Just saying, I made this on vacation with mobile data in my laptop with a trackpad so don't expect anything too good!
